entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
